parameters.name: GroupByKey
parameters.description:
The dimension by which resources are grouped. Valid values:

*   ResourceType: specifies that resources are grouped by type.
*   Region: specifies that resources are grouped by region.

parameters.name: MemberId
parameters.description: This parameter has been removed from 00:00:00, June 30, 2021. Account group-related operations are provided as an alternative after 00:00:00, May 30, 2021. If you are using this parameter, we recommend that you switch to account group-related operations after 00:00:00, May 30, 2021. For more information about account groups, see [Overview](~~211534~~).

parameters.name: MultiAccount
parameters.description: This parameter has been removed from 00:00:00, June 30, 2021. Account group-related operations are provided as an alternative after 00:00:00, May 30, 2021. If you are using this parameter, we recommend that you switch to account group-related operations after 00:00:00, May 30, 2021. For more information about account groups, see [Overview](~~211534~~).
